Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Aberdeen
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Morgan, 86th, Racine, and 87th, due to street blockage near 87th/Aberdeen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Morgan, 86th, Racine, and 87th, due to street blockage near 87th/Aberdeen.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
